Request for Proposal (RFP)
Executive Summary
The Education Network is seeking proposals from experienced
development teams for the creation of an API Integration Platform to
modernize our e-commerce capabilities. This project aims to enhance user
experience, streamline operations, and expand our service offerings. We
are looking for a dedicated team to deliver this solution over a duration of
22 months, with a starting date of November 28, 2025.
Project Overview
Project Title:  API Integration Platform Development
Client:  Education Network
Project Type:  Mobile App Development
Location:  South Gregoryview (Remote work allowed)
Duration:  22 months
Team Size:  11 people
Budget Range:  $100K - $250K
Business Context and Objectives
The Education Network has recognized the need to modernize its e-
commerce platform to better serve our users and meet the growing
demands of the market. The objectives of this project include: -
Developing a robust API Integration Platform that supports various e-
commerce functionalities. - Ensuring a seamless user experience across
mobile and web applications. - Implementing best practices in cloud
services and container management for scalability and reliability.• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
Technical Requirements
The following technical skills and experience are required for the
development team:
Java:  Intermediate level (Preferred certifications: Certified
Kubernetes Administrator, AWS Certified Solutions Architect)
TypeScript:  Advanced level (Required certifications: Google Cloud
Professional)
Django:  Intermediate level
Angular:  Advanced level (Preferred certifications: Certified
Kubernetes Administrator, AWS Certified Solutions Architect)
Docker:  Expert level
Expected Team Profile
We are looking for a diverse team of professionals with the following
profiles:
Backend Developers (2)
Strong experience in Java and Django.
Familiarity with API development and integration.
Frontend Developers (3)
Proficiency in Angular and TypeScript.
Experience in creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces.
DevOps Engineer (1)
Expertise in Docker and cloud technologies.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code.
QA Engineers (2)
Strong background in automated and manual testing.
Familiarity with testing APIs and e-commerce systems.•

Excellent communication and leadership skills.
Business Analyst (1)
Experience in gathering requirements and stakeholder management.
Ability to translate business needs into technical specifications.
Timeline
RFP Release Date:  [Insert Date]
Proposal Submission Deadline:  [Insert Date]
Proposal Evaluation Period:  [Insert Date]
Contract Award Date:  [Insert Date]
Project Kickoff:  November 28, 2025
Expected Completion Date:  [Insert Date]
Budget
The budget for this project is set between $100K and $250K . Proposals
should include a detailed cost breakdown, including personnel,
technology, and overhead costs.
Proposal Guidelines
Interested parties should submit their proposals by [Insert Submission

Proposals must include:
Company overview and relevant experience
Detailed project plan and timeline

effectiveness - T eam qualifications and certifications - Previous client
references and case studies
Evaluation Process
The evaluation team will review all submitted proposals and shortlist
candidates for interviews. The final selection will be based on a
combination of technical fit, team capability, and budget alignment.
Contact Information
For any questions regarding this RFP, please contact: - Name:  [Your
Name] - Email:  [contact@example.com] - Phone:  [Your Phone Number]
Thank you for considering this opportunity to partner with the Education

Request for Proposal (RFP)
Project: Data Analytics Platform
Development
Client:  Retail Solutions Ltd
Project Type:  Cloud Migration Project 
Executive Summary
Retail Solutions Ltd is seeking proposals from qualified development teams
to design and implement a robust Data Analytics Platform as part of our
cloud migration initiative. The goal is to leverage machine learning
capabilities to enhance our data processing and analytics functionalities,
ultimately leading to improved decision-making and operational efficiency.
Project Overview
The Data Analytics Platform will serve as a centralized hub for data
collection, processing, and analysis, enabling our retail operations to
harness the power of data-driven insights. The project is expected to last
22 months, starting on November 28, 2025, and will be carried out in
Rickyville, where remote work is not permitted.
Objectives
Develop a scalable and secure Data Analytics Platform on the
cloud. 
Implement machine learning algorithms to analyze retail data. 
Ensure seamless integration with existing retail systems and
databases. • 
• 
• 
Technical Requirements
The ideal development team will possess the following technical skills and
certifications: 
DevOps
Level: Intermediate 
Preferred Certifications: Google Cloud Professional 
Node.js
Level: Intermediate 
Preferred Certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect 
MongoDB
Level: Advanced 
Machine Learning
Level: Expert (Preferred) 
Kubernetes
Level: Intermediate 
Preferred Certifications: Google Cloud Professional, Certified
Kubernetes Administrator 
Django
Level: Expert 
Angular
Level: Advanced • 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
Expected Team Profile
The project will require a dedicated team of 4 members with the following
roles: 
Lead Developer
Expertise in Django and machine learning with strong leadership
skills. 
Responsibilities: Oversee project development and implementation. 
Backend Developer
Strong skills in Node.js and MongoDB. 
Responsibilities: Develop server-side logic and database
management. 
DevOps Engineer
Proficient in Kubernetes and cloud solutions. 
Responsibilities: Manage infrastructure and deployment processes. 
Frontend Developer
Expertise in Angular. 
Responsibilities: Create user interfaces and ensure responsive design.
Timeline
RFP Release Date:  [Insert Release Date] 
Proposal Submission Deadline:  [Insert Deadline] 
Proposal Evaluation Period:  [Insert Evaluation Period] 
Final Team Selection:  [Insert Selection Date] 
Project Kick-off:  November 28, 2025 
Project Duration:  22 months 1.

Budget
The budget for this project ranges from $100,000 to $250,000 .
Proposals must include a detailed breakdown of costs associated with
development, infrastructure, and any ongoing support. 
Proposal Guidelines
Interested teams should submit their proposals by the submission
deadline, including:
- A cover letter outlining interest and qualifications.
- Detailed project approach and methodology.
- Profiles and resumes of team members.
- Case studies or examples of previous relevant work.
- A proposed timeline and detailed budget breakdown. 
Acceptance Criteria and Evaluation Process
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
- T echnical expertise and experience in relevant technologies.
- Quality of previous work and case studies.
- Clarity and feasibility of the proposed project approach.
- Cost-effectiveness and budget alignment. 
Shortlisted candidates may be invited for interviews and further
discussions before final selection.
Contact Information
For any inquiries regarding this RFP, please contact:
Name:  [Insert Contact Name]
Email:  [Insert Contact Email]
Phone:  [Insert Contact Phone] 
Proposal Submission
Please submit your proposals electronically to [Insert Submission Email] by
the proposal submission deadline. We look forward to reviewing your
submissions and establishing a partnership that drives our cloud migration
success.

Request for Proposal (RFP)
Project:  E-commerce Modernization Development
Client:  MedT ech Industries
Project Type:  Mobile App Development 
Executive Summary
MedT ech Industries is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
development team to undertake the modernization of its e-commerce
platform. This project aims to enhance the current web application,
focusing on improving user experience, increasing operational efficiency,
and integrating advanced technological solutions. The project is expected
to span over 12 months, starting on November 28, 2025, with an
estimated budget range of $500K - $1M. Remote work is allowed,
providing flexibility to the development team.
Project Overview
The objective of this project is to develop a robust enterprise-level e-
commerce web application that meets the evolving needs of our users and
aligns with the strategic goals of MedT ech Industries. The application
should be scalable, secure, and maintainable, leveraging modern
technologies and frameworks. 
Specific Deliverables:
A fully functional e-commerce web application 
Integration with existing systems and third-party services 
Documentation for the codebase and user manuals 
Deployment of the application to a cloud environment 
Ongoing support and maintenance for the duration of the contract • 
• 
• 
• 
• 
Milestones:
Milestone 1:  Project Kick-off and Requirement Gathering –
December 2025 
Milestone 2:  Completion of Design Phase – February 2026 
Milestone 3:  Development Phase Completion – August 2026 
Milestone 4:  T esting Phase Completion – October 2026 
Milestone 5:  Project Go-Live – November 2026 
Technical Requirements
We require the following technical expertise from the development team: 
REQUIRED:
React:  Expert level 
PostgreSQL:  Expert level 
Docker:  Advanced level (Preferred certifications: Certified
Kubernetes Administrator) 
JavaScript:  Expert level (Preferred certifications: Google Cloud
Professional) 
Microservices:  Advanced level (Preferred certifications: AWS
Certified Solutions Architect) 
Kubernetes:  Advanced level (Preferred certifications: Certified
Kubernetes Administrator) 
Django:  Intermediate level 
PREFERRED:
DevOps:  Intermediate level (Preferred certifications: AWS Certified
Solutions Architect) 
AWS:  Intermediate level (Preferred certifications: Google Cloud
Professional, Certified Kubernetes Administrator) 
Node.js:  Intermediate level (Preferred certifications: Google Cloud
Professional, Certified Kubernetes Administrator) • 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
Expected Team Profile
We anticipate the following roles within the development team: 
Frontend Developer (1 position):
Expertise in React and JavaScript 
Experience in building responsive and user-friendly interfaces 
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and integration 
Backend Developer (1 position):
Proficient in PostgreSQL and Django 
Experience in microservices architecture 
Strong knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes 
DevOps Engineer (1 position):
Experience with cloud services (AWS preferred) 
Familiarity with CI/CD processes and tools 
Knowledge of container orchestration and management 
Timeline
The project is expected to commence on November 28, 2025 , and
conclude within 12 months. 
Budget
The estimated budget for this project ranges from $500K to $1M . 
Proposal Guidelines
Interested parties should submit their proposals by [insert deadline for
proposals] . Proposals must include:
- Company background and relevant experience
- Profiles of the proposed team members1.

The evaluation process will involve reviewing submitted proposals,

Executive Summary
MedT ech Industries is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
development team to undertake the modernization of its e-commerce
platform. This project aims to enhance the current web application,
focusing on improving user experience, increasing operational efficiency,
and integrating advanced technological solutions. The project is expected
to span over 12 months, starting on November 28, 2025, with an
estimated budget range of $500K - $1M. Remote work is allowed,
providing flexibility to the development team.
Project Overview
The objective of this project is to develop a robust enterprise-level e-
commerce web application that meets the evolving needs of our users and
aligns with the strategic goals of MedT ech Industries. The application
should be scalable, secure, and maintainable, leveraging modern
technologies and frameworks. 
Specific Deliverables:
A fully functional e-commerce web application 
Integration with existing systems and third-party services

Ongoing support and maintenance for the duration of the contract •

Strong knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes
